name: No Rat can stop this
description:
Game about protecting your engine. You are a spanner and you protect your cogs, that are delivering power that runs your car. It's a simple TowerDefense type of game.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Arrows - Movement

Mouse - Looking direction

Space - Building

Escape - Menu

Keypad Enter - Restart

This game is unfinished, but that is the nature of GamJam. Thank you for playing! :)
